111112.content:
(NOTE: This is a Non-TF version of this storyline here http://www.writing.com/main/interact/ite...)
Krystal is sent on a mission to a snow-covered planet, but needs to pack on the pounds so she doesn't turn into a fox-cicle.

1111122.content: How about Krystal aining an appetite and eating way more than usual? She then ends up a bit on the large side.
1111122.title: Second Choice.

choices: Suddenly her mouth is pulled open and a tube is forced into her.
She hears a loud clanking as a machine starts up, seemingly above her.
11112.content:
Krystal groaned as she woke up, her head pounding. She seemed to have a blindfold around her head, preventing her from seeing anything. She tried remembering how she ended up like this, but it just made her head hurt worse, so she gave that up for now. Trying to reach up and hold her head to stop the pain and remove the blindfold, she found out that she couldn't move her arms, they were bound down. Testing her legs got the same result. From what she could tell, she was bound in soft chair of some sort, but with her limited mobility and lack of eye sight, she couldn't be sure. Using her other senses, she couldn't find anything familiar, not the sounds, smells, or anything. Just at the edge of her hearing, she thought she could hear someone breathing.

"Hello? Is someone here? Where am I?" She said, trying to not let the fear she was starting to feel creep into her voice.

The only response she got was the sound of footsteps coming closer. They stopped nearly on top of her. Suddenly, a hand roughly grabbed her body, starting with her toned stomach, then moving up to her pert breasts. She realized with a sickening feeling, that she was either almost completely or completely nude. She tried pulling back from the person, but couldn't get far. A barely audible growl seemed to come from whoever it was, before the footsteps moved a short ways around her.
11112.title: Darkness

choices: The pumping continues, and yet she doesn't burst.
Seeing her condition, whoever it is stops the flow, at least for now.
111121.content:
As her mouth is roughly pulled open, Krystal gives a shout of surprise. Though it is quickly cut off as something is forced into her mouth. She is barely able to register that it is a tube of some sort as is continues past her mouth and down her throat. It seems to be made in such a way that she can breath around it, but only somewhat. Now, blind, bound, and with a tube fed into her body, she is getting quite scared. A few more footsteps can be heard after a slight pause, likely to check that the tube was inserted well enough.

The hum of a machine starting up can be heard, and the tube starts to vibrate. After a few moments of this, Krystal can suddenly feel the tube starting to pulse, like something was being pumped through it...straight into her! She struggled against her bonds, only succeeding in injuring her arms and legs. Biting down on the tube did little except made her headache worse, and the tube was inserted too far for her to try and spit it out.

With a whimper, she was forced to sit there, as this pump continued to push whatever it was into her. It didn't take long, but she could feel her small stomach filling up, and yet the pumping continued. On and on, the flow went, and she could feel her belly starting to stretch and grow. If this continued, she might just burst. Redoubling her efforts to try and escape did nothing to help, only making her her head pound worse, and adding to the growing pain of her stretched stomach.
111121.title: Suddenly her mouth is pulled open and a tube is...

choices: She is unbound and freed from the machine and taken elsewhere.
Whoever it was doing this to her walks away, leaving her trapped.
1111211.content:
The pump continued to drone on, and the flow continued to surge. Oh, how she wanted to break free, and tear this horrible tube from her throat. Her stomach continued to stretch and bloat, seemingly far beyond what she should have been able to hold, but it was hard to be sure being bound and blinded as she was. She dreaded to think of it, but she thought she could even hear her skin and hide groaning, struggling to contain large load within.

The pain within Krystal's stomach soon trumped the pounding in her head, even making her thoughts sluggish and unresponsive. A tear started to roll down her face, fearful that she was reaching her limits, and that this was how it was going to end.

Just as she thought that was sure to burst, the machine clicked off with a sputter. The tube gave one final pulse, and her bloated stomach gave a final lurch. Krystal could have almost cried with joy, if it wasn't for her thoughts being so foggy from the pain, as well as knowing that it likely wasn't over.
1111211.title: Filling the vixen

choices: She is awoken from her sleep as someone opens the door again.
11112111.content:
Krystal was not giving much time to recover as her arms and legs were freed, and the tube was extracted from her throat. Unable to think clearly, she was suddenly hit with a bout of pain as someone seemingly tenderly touched her swollen stomach. It didn't last long before she was pulled from the chair and forced along. It took her a moment to figure out, but someone had a hold of her arm and was guiding her along. The lances of pain from her bloated middle caused her to stumble sometimes, which only prompted the person to give a short growl and pull her along again, causing her stomach to flair up again, and so on. She was quickly able to figure out that she should try to keep up best that she could.

Unable to keep track of the steps and the turns they take, Krystal was pulled to a stop, before some clicking can be heard. Her assumption that it was a lock being unbolted was proved when she heard the lock click louder as well as the creak of a door opening. She was then unceremoniously shoved through the door, but as it happened, the person was able to catch the blindfold and pull it off as she fell. She gasped loudly as she nearly fell on her stomach, and as such was too distracted to turn around and look until it was too late. The door was already pulled shut, and she could hear the clack as the lock sealed again.

She struggled to stand, she was forced to come face to face with her real problem: her over inflated stomach. It was a firm sphere, completely hard to the touch (though she didn't try touching it for too long, too much pain radiating out from the light pressure). She turned her gaze away with disgust and revulsion and stifled a sob, and took stock of where she seemed to be held for now. Her eyes were quickly drawn to the bed in the room, her body quickly becoming overcome with a deep sense of fatigue. Stumbling her way to the bed, she laid down as best she could, careful around her stomach. She gave up on the covers after the light touch of them caused yet another stab of pain to cause her to nearly become sick again. She soon passed into a fitful sleep, a tear rolling down her face, and her body already working on the "meal" that was forced into her.
11112111.title: Still trapped

choices: Her body worked "overnight" and she has gained some weight.
She has actually gained quite a bit of weight, making her undeniably fat.
111121111.content:
Krystal yawned as she awoke, then her face fell as memories of what happened to her crashed back into her brain. She felt like she had been asleep for some time, though it was hard to tell with no windows or clocks around. She lay there, eyes screwed shut, dread seeping through her at what could happen next. Finally, with a groan she opened her eyes and took a look around. Plain cream walls surrounded her, and it was even reasonably well decorated and furnished. She might have thought it was a hotel room of sorts, if it wasn't for the door's lock being on the outside, and lack of anything she could use to get a message out. There was a TV set on the wall, but she wasn't feeling up to watching TV considering her situation.

A thought wormed it's way into her brain, she had some dream of someone coming into the room and watching her sleep. She couldn't get a good look at the person, but whoever it was seemed to consider her body, including her bloated belly. Another feeling of sickness washed over her as her thoughts landed on what had happened to her before she was brought to this room and slept. What if that dream hadn't been a dream though, what if that was someone who had bought her here for this?

Little she could do about that right now though, so with a groan she tried sitting up. She found it was more difficult that she remembered. Sometime during the night, she seemed to have pulled the covers up. Her stomach didn't seem to be the rock hard sphere it was, but something still seemed off under the blankets. Getting a good grip, she threw the covers back. It took a few seconds for her brain to kick into gear as she looked at herself, then she proceeded to scream.
111121111.title: Waking surprise

choices: Food is inserted into the room, a lot of food.
Someone unlocks the door and comes in.
The door clicks as it unlocks and comes open, seemingly by itself.
1111211112.content:
Her body had seemingly digested everything that had been forced into her and converted it directly into fat, far more fat than she would have thought possible. It looked like she had somehow gained around one hundred pounds of pure fat, every part bloated with a thick layer of blubber. Her stomach had lost the rock hard packed shape and turned into a large fleshy bag rising above her thickened body. The formerly decent sized breasts atop her chest had taken more than their share of her new weight and turned into soft orbs resting atop her gut. Moving her arms, she found that both had plumped up as well, matching her larger hips and thighs. Turning her head to get her gaze away from her swollen body, she was shocked to feel how her chin and face had expanded just the same.

A solitary tear ran down her chubby cheek before she fought down her revulsion and fear. Opening her eyes again, they shined with a steely fire, as she knew that breaking down wouldn’t help her get out of this situation. With a grunt, she forced herself up into a sitting position then stood up quickly…before falling right back down onto the bed because of her new center of balance. Taking it a bit slower on the next try worked slightly better, but her wobbling wiggling body threatened to pull her to the ground with each movement. She gave a determined growl as she forced her fattened body around the room, trying to find any way out.

Despite her best hopes, the door proved quiet locked, and too sturdy to try and knock down. A second door opened into a lavious bathroom, complete with a huge whirlpool tub and shower combo. Krystal had to suppress a shudder at the thought of needing such a large tub herself. Finding no way to escape in the bathroom, the vixen forced her body back to the other room to continue searching. After checking every possible spot she could, she let herself fall heavily onto the bed. Even just sitting there caused her fattened body to shift and wobble slightly as she panted heavily from the limited movement she put herself though. She let out another growl, angered at how limited her ability to move was right then, let alone if whoever had trapped her did anything else to her.

A sudden loud rumbling noise startled the fattened fox, and she had no idea where it was coming from at first. When the noise came again, even louder that time, she realized that her it was her stomach. Her gut expressed its displeasure a third time, giving her a hunger pang along with the grumble. The pain and noise continued to build – far faster than it should have been – wracking her body and making it feel like her stomach was gnawing on itself. Just as she thought she might pass out from the hunger, she was able to make out another noise between the roars of her stomach.
1111211112.title: A fulfilling night

choices: She decides to get cleaned up first.
Rest first, she doesn’t feel up to bathing yet.
Despite everything, her stomach lets out another hungry grumble.
11112111121.content:
Between the relentless grumbling and groaning of her stomach, Krystal was able to make out a small sound. Distracted as she was with her insistent hunger, she almost didn’t notice the slot that opened at the base of the door. Through the formerly hidden hole, a tray of food was inserted, followed by a second and a third. The smells wafting off the platters only stirred her hunger even further; eggs and toast, pancakes and sausage, along french toast and bacon, all in amounts that would feed three or four people each, let alone all together. Before she even thought to react, the hatch shut with a barely audible click, looking like the door was made from one solid piece again.

Despite her hunger, Krystal tried to hold out against the food offered to her, not wanting anything else to happen to her. Her will held out for only a few seconds, the aroma of the food causing her head to slowly twist around to look at the trays. No matter how hard she tried, she found that she couldn’t tear her eyes away. Her mouth watered and she licked her lips as she continued to stare at the food, her body betraying her as she started to unconsciously scoot down the bed closer to the food her attention was locked on. As her arm reached out to nearly touch one of the trays, she gave one last act of defiance, pulling her arm back. The last of her will fell as she then pounced at the food, giving into her unnatural hunger.

She lost all conscious control of her body as she stuffed herself with all of the food given to her. Not even bothering with the silverware, the vixen shoveled handfuls of food into her maw, barely even chewing before swallowing to make room for the next. She finally came to while licking one of her hands to try and get the last remnants of food clinging to her fur there. With agonizingly slowness, she looked down at her body, finding that her softened stomach had again taken on its rock hard appearance, but even larger than before. Little gobs of grease and syrup as well as bits and pieces of the food clung to the fur of her breasts and around her mouth. Some small part of her mind was at least thankful for her hunger being sated…for now, while the rest was disgusted at what she had done to herself.

Struggling, she tried and failed to stand up several times, her stuffed stomach weighing her down in addition to her fattened body. Finally succeeding, she braced herself on the end of the bed, her legs quivering from being unused to holding up her swollen body, causing the rest of her body to wobble from the motion. She accidentally brushed her fingers across her stomach, and expected another blast of pain like the last time, but was partially relieved that the pain was much less than before. It was still enough to cause her to hiss slightly as she inhaled sharply. Letting the minor agony pass, her thoughts slowly turned to her next actions, her mind slightly foggy from her recent gluttony.
11112111121.title: Meal time

11223121.content:
Krystal had been a member of StarFox for a year now, and she was much different than how she was when she first joined. Becoming a member shortly after Fox's adventures on Sauria, Krystal had a skinny physique and weighed a respectable weight, but then Fox introduced her to some of the more delicious aspects of living with the team. The food was cheap due to the team's budget, but it sure was tasty! The rations, containing of mountains of chocolate in various forms, pizza, potato chips, all the stuff their parents told them was junk food when they were kids, was well in stock on the Great Fox. With a food budget of only 1000 credits, they had to make do with what they could, and they were well off with buying cheap, affordable junk food. And Krystal was loving it.

Now, a year later, the vixen had ballooned in size, now weighing 300lbs from days of snacking on junk food that Fox fed her. She had suspected that Fox was doing it purposefully for some reason because he would always weigh her at the end of the week, and this week when she came in at 300, Fox was strangely overjoyed. Now she found herself sitting on a table designed to support her weight, while Fox looked on. He had a strange look on his face and kept licking his lips.

"Fox, would you mind telling me why I'm on this table?" She asked the skinnier fox, who only chuckled in response.

She asked again, and after a few laughs, he finally told her why she was being displayed on this very sturdy table.
11223121.title: Chocolate will do that to you

choices: Try a challenge and start with the head
112231212.content:
Fox licked his lips as he stared at the huge girth of a meal he had in front of him. "I'm going to eat you, Krystal." Fox said bluntly.

Krystal's eyes went wide and she struggled a bit, but found herself too heavy to move. "W-what? Eat me?" She asked, both scared and confused. She had seen Fox devour Falco once and knew he was capable of swallowing people his size whole, but someone of her size?

Fox nodded and licked his lips. "I'm a cannibal, Krystal...and while I do enjoy the taste of males, I also like to eat females...but some are special...some need more meat on their bones...." He prodded the fat blob Krystal had become as he spoke. "So for you, I had to put some weight on you!" He grinned and showed his sharp, white teeth.

Krystal whimpered and Fox stood up on the table. "But you've ballooned quite a lot! I'm gonna need my special medicine for this!" Fox said as he pulled out a small bottle from his pants pocket.

The blue vixen watched as Fox dropped a pill into the palm of his hand and swallowed it. "This is a new drug Slippy and I have been working on. We call it "Snake's Pleasure". It allows my body to expand in anyway possible. I can stretch my jaws wide enough to swallow you, and my stomach can hold even a Landmaster. Of course, there's side-effects. The only one being is that it kills my stomach acid for five hours." Fox said as he placed a finger on Krystal's chin and made her look into his eyes.

"But five hours is long enough for me to keep you inside me, huh? But here's the thing...it also releases a chemical that will allow me to regurgitate you....but in the process, it'll eat all of the weight you've put on."

Krystal tried to spit at him, but Fox turned his head at the last moment. "You have no idea how long I've been planning this, Krystal. Watching you with hungry eyes, just waiting for you to become the ideal weight for my eating. And once I'm done, I'll have the pleasure of fattening you up again to eat you all over again!"

Krystal gasped as Fox laughed heavily. "Now how to eat you?"
112231212.title: Krystal for dinner

choices: I want to write one too!
11223122.content: Alright! Let's start your story! But let's leave a space for someone else to start one too! Be fair, follow this format so everyone has a chance to write something!
11223122.title: I'll make one

1123.title: Krystal and (your choice)

11231.content: So Krystal is the only predator in the storyline. So where shall the story start?
11231.title: Krystal the Man-Eater.

Something happens to Krystal that makes her gain twice as much weight from eating junk food. Is Krystal the only one infected by this mysterious virus?
